name: Block Rush (Binsk)
description:
Can you escape the lava?

Dash, jump, and pound with the arrow keys. You have to think quick and strategically in order to climb the falling blocks and avoid the ever-rising lava!

This is a game of survival where only the highest score has the right to brag. Do well enough and maybe, just maybe, the game see fit to grant you access to the hardest mode of all where it goes all out in an attempt to bring you down...

Beta

This game is currently in beta and open to suggestions. If you think things need to change or you really want to see a feature, let me know in the comments!

Currently achievements are limited in number / effect, saves do not work correctly in the browser saves are handled locally, and I have yet to implement the global high score board. Still, the game is fully playable.
